description: TaskMaster Pro is an advanced task management system designed for efficient task creation, editing, and tracking. It enables users to set due dates, establish priorities, assign tasks to team members, and provides a dashboard for monitoring task progress, deadlines, and productivity reports.

keyFeatures.name: Task Creation and Editing
keyFeatures.description: Users can create new tasks, edit existing ones, and update task details as needed.

keyFeatures.name: Due Dates and Priorities
keyFeatures.description: Set deadlines for tasks and prioritize them to ensure important tasks are tackled promptly.

keyFeatures.name: Task Assignment
keyFeatures.description: Assign tasks to specific team members to delegate work efficiently among team members.

keyFeatures.name: Dashboard
keyFeatures.description: A central dashboard displays overall task progress, upcoming deadlines, and priority tasks.

keyFeatures.name: Notifications
keyFeatures.description: Receive real-time notifications for upcoming deadlines and any changes made to task status or details.

keyFeatures.name: Productivity Reports
keyFeatures.description: Generate comprehensive reports on team productivity and task completion rates over time.

targetAudienceAnalysis.primaryUsers: Project Managers, Team Leads, Employees in collaborative environments
targetAudienceAnalysis.secondaryUsers: Freelancers, SMEs looking for task management solutions

userPersonas.name: Project Manager
userPersonas.goals: Oversee project progress and ensure deadline adherence.
userPersonas.painPoints: Difficulty in keeping track of team productivity and task deadlines.

userPersonas.name: Team Member
userPersonas.goals: Complete assigned tasks efficiently and communicate effectively within the team.
userPersonas.painPoints: Lack of clarity on task priorities and deadlines.

businessObjectives: Increase market penetration for task management solutions.
Provide an all-in-one platform for task delegation and productivity tracking.
Enhance collaboration and communication within teams.

constraints: Data privacy laws and regulations must be complied with (GDPR, CCPA).
Scalability to accommodate large teams without performance degradation.
assumptions: Users have basic digital literacy and access to the necessary technology.
The system will be used across various time zones, necessitating timezone support.
